title: shObhAna shObhAnave
sahitya:
shObhAna shObhAnave


anupallavi

  bhUdEviyarasa vEnkaTarAyage shObhAna shObhnave


caraNam 1    andu kSIrAmbunidhi modalAgi indire haruSadindudisi bandu 
kandarpa kOTi lAvaNya mUrutiyAda mandAra mAleya hAkida dEvage
    caraNam 2    janakana maneyalli rAjAdi rAjaru eNikeyilladale barutiralu 
sanakAdi vandyana kaNDu santOSadi jAnaki mAleya hAkida rAmage
    caraNam 3    rukumanu shishupAlakanu jeyIyuvanendu sakala rAyaralli bandiralAgi 
bhakuta vatsalanannu kaNDu kaNDu santOSadi rukumiNi mAleya hAkida krSNage
    caraNam 4    satyabhAmeyu nIle bhadre kALindiyu mitravindeyu lakSaNeyu jAmbavati 
matte A sOLa sAhasra kannikeyara pratyakSavALida kalyANanige
    caraNam 5    paduma dEshadalobba dEvAnganeya padumamukhi shruti hrtiya 
padumanAbha purandara viTtalage padumAvati priya shrInivAsage
